Title: Thai Jashe!
Writer: Nirav Barot, Jay Bhatt (screen play), Prayag Dave (dialogue)
Actors: Manoj Joshi, Malhar Thakar, Kumkum Das, Monal Gajjar
Plot: Thai Jashe! is an upcoming Gujarati film written and directed by Nirav Barot. It is about the struggles of a middle class man to achieve his goals in the metro-city Ahmedabad. The film ...
